summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting assignment of certain electrical service easement rights over portions of Lot 13, Block 14, Victory Heights; Lot 14, Block 7, Plat of Victory Heights Addition; Section 10, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M., Section 21, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M., Lot 4, Block 3, Brighton Beach; Lots 17 and 18, Wallis Country Club Tracts; Lot 12, Block 14, Victory Heights; Lots 5 and 6, Acre 3, Maplewild Terraces, as described below and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
